gameBoard - Variable in class model.TicTacToeBoard
2D array of Tiles that represents the game board, as it is a 3x3 array.
GameState - Enum Class in model
This enum represents the possible states of a Tic-Tac-Toe game: a win for one of the players, a tie, a game in progress, and an invalid move.
